heroSection.title: Join the Fight: Blood Donation in Bangladesh
heroSection.description: In Bangladesh, every drop of blood counts. Your donation can save lives, especially during emergencies or for patients in need. Join us in this noble cause and make a difference in your community. Together, we can ensure that no one is deprived of life-saving blood.

blogComponent.title: Blood Donation in Bangladesh
blogComponent.description: Join the cause and save lives through blood donation.
